text: I'm Burt Wonderstone dime Anton
marvelton but of course you already knew
that
incredible Burt Wonderstone is about a
Las Vegas magician played by steve
carell who hits the skids after ten
years at the top agent in his review
stephen holden rights because mr. corral
doesn't go for all-out caricature the

cuts against its farcical aspirations
this is not to say that mr. karelle
isn't just fine only that his
performance impressive as it is lacks a
shark's bite finally the incredible Burt
Wonderstone can't transcend the
fundamental problem built into movies
and television shows about magic good
barber it isn't really magic if you're
watching a second hand where did he go
he has gone to a better place
